page.title: 04FISHING CLUB SUTTON C'FIELD
page.content: There are local clubs for societies such as Cubs,Scouts,Brownies and Guides.You can practice judo and karate.There are tennis courts and football teams,or you can{fish.} Four million people nationwide regularly go fishing.In the grounds of Langley Mill Farm is the pool which serves the{Langley Mill Fishing } {Association.}It is stocked with carp, roach,perch and bream. This fresh-water pool is something of a{nature reserve.}It is regularly visited by birds such as the mallard, coots and grebes. It is a welcome place of tranquility mainly for men and boys avoiding the noise and bustle of the the town. Recently{volunteers}have cleaned the pool of rubbish.With the recent rise in{unemployment}the pool seems to be in increasing demand for leisure.
